releaseNotes:
Auto-generated from commit: fix: comprehensive mobile compatibility fixes for iOS/Android

- Fix viewport meta tags (remove user-scalable, add viewport-fit)
- Add mobile-specific CSS (-webkit-fill-available, safe-area-inset)
- Create ErrorBoundary for debugging mobile issues
- Add viewport height script for Android Chrome address bar
- Implement touch targets minimum 44x44px
- Fix position fixed flickering with GPU acceleration
- Remove tap highlight and improve touch scrolling
- Proper CSS loading order for mobile
